general.toolbarTitle: Valuables, Cards, Electronics and Smartphone Insurance

bullets: Provides compensation for stolen cash or funds from an account, including phishing incidents, as well as for the theft or loss of personal and work-related belongings
Covers the repair of a broken phone or tablet with Smart Banking, or contributes to the purchase of a new device.
Online, for example while shopping, you can use the assistance of IT experts
Covers you at home and abroad

bullets: Provides compensation for stolen cash or funds from an account, including phishing incidents, as well as for the theft or loss of personal and work-related belongings

familyHelp.title: Insurance for you and your family
familyHelp.detail: The Me and My Family insurance option covers you and: ⚫︎ your spouse, registered partner, your partner living with you in the same household, your biological, adopted, or foster children, or children under your guardianship, up to their 18th birthday. There is no limit on the number of children covered by the policy.

agreement.insurancePaymentDescription: The payment will be deducted automatically, and it will cover the insurance premium for the previous month.
agreement.agreementTitle: I confirm that I have reviewed the product information and the Insurance Terms and Conditions
agreement.agreementInfo: You will find the insurance contract documentation in your Smart Banka and Internet Banka after the agreement is concluded.

contract.title: Read the Insurance Agreement
contract.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka under Documents.

busyLoader.title: We’re preparing the insurance policy
busyLoader.detail: It should only take a moment.

victory.title:
Done.
The coverage is effective starting midnight.
victory.detail: You can find an overview of all your insurance policies in My Insurance.

disagree.title: Your agreement is required
disagree.detail: Do you have any questions? Call us or visit one of our branches.

single.title: Insurance change: from Family to Single
single.name: Valuables, Cards, Electronics and Smartphone Insurance

family.title: Insurance change: from Single to Family
family.name: Valuables, Cards, Electronics and Smartphone Insurance
family.infoSectionTitle: Me and family insurance is valid for you and:
infoSection: Spouse, registered partner, common-law partner, provided that the partner lives with the account holder in the same household.

Children of the account holder or their partner living with the account holder in the same household, including adopted, foster or foster children, under the age of 18. There is no limit to the number of children.

packageChange.changeSectionTitle: How will the change take place?
changeSection: First we will cancel the existing insurance
Then we will arrange a new one
packageChange.activationSectionTitle: From when will the insurance be active?
packageChange.activationSectionInfo: On this day, the validity of the current insurance will also expire.
